page.title: 07Our School 2.
page.content: Our school is divided into 2 classes with 2 teachers.They range in age from 4-9years old.When they leave rhey go to Minehead Middle School.We have a large tarmaced playground and a grass adventure playground with a tunnel and a slide.We haven't got a Hall but we can use the Village Hall on any day for football,catchball,P.E. Gymnastics Movement,Drama and Country Dancing.We are lucky to have a swimming pool.It's exciting going in but very cold. Lots of us can swim.In school we have a woodwork room.Boys and girls both do woodwork.We bang our fingers and cut ourselves but we don't worry.We make aeroplanes and boats,anything we like. We have pocket calculators and a Computer in school but it sometimes breaks down and has to be mended.We do painting,collage,clay,sketching,draw- ing and junk modelling.We do maths
